HomePage.slogan: Developing the Land, Building the Future

FeaturesSection.heading: The Company
FeaturesSection.subtitle: Transforming Nepal's landscape through sustainable development
FeaturesSection.description: Nepal Bhumi Bank will extensively link fallow lands across Nepal to productive uses. It will lease and utilize government, trust (guthi), authority, organizational, and private house lands for operations. Through integrated land plans, including purchase/sale of properties, housing, apartments, homes, malls, and towers with construction,it will implement land use policies, supporting the state via private sector involvement. Nepal Bhumi Bank Limited is a leading land banking institution promoting sustainable development nationwide. Founded with a vision to convert uneven terrains into thriving, eco-friendly communities, it specializes in land acquisition, development, and distribution, incorporating modern amenities like schools, hospitals, parks, and utilities. Our environmental commitment ensures balanced growth in every project, offering flexible investments and transparent deals tailored to clients. Through national partnerships and social responsibility, we aim to create a prosperous Nepal where land is a secure, generational asset.

sustainableLandDevelopment.title: Sustainable Land Development
sustainableLandDevelopment.description: The policy focuses on efficient land use, managing land sustainably in its existing condition. Modern settlements will be developed across Nepal while conserving the environment and natural resources, and offered for sale or lease in the public interest.

propertyAcquisition.title: Property Acquisition and Enhancement
propertyAcquisition.description: Land owned by individuals, associations, institutions, and guthis will be scientifically utilized while ensuring asset protection. Uneven or sloped lands will be acquired and converted into valuable assets for sale or distribution.

investmentPartnership.title: Investment and Partnership Expansion
investmentPartnership.description: Nepal Bhumi Bank Ltd., established with NPR 250 million and targeting NPR 50 billion in private investment, offers promoter shares at a ratio of 1:100. A minimum of 1 million shares can be purchased using cash or movable and immovable assets.

InvestSection.heading: Root Riches in Bhumi – Invest & Thrive!
InvestSection.content: By purchasing promoter shares, one can become a founding investor. At a rate of 100, one can become a promoter share member by purchasing at least 10,000 shares. To avail services, by filling out the customer form, one can access all services provided by Bhumi Bank for life. For this, to receive services and facilities, participation in the “Hatemalo Campaign” is required. To join that campaign, a one-time payment of 25,000/- (twenty-five thousand) must be made. And no additional fees are required for any services taken. When renting out lands, houses, and similar places, or leasing them, we will charge 5% as service fee. No other amount needs to be paid.We will handle the electricity, water, maintenance, and conservation ourselves.

TestimonialsSection.heading: What Our Clients Say
TestimonialsSection.subtitle: Hear Directly From Our Satisfied Partners

1.text: Integrating Nepal Bhumi Bank's services has been a game-changer for our business operations. We've seen significant improvements in our financial management and a notable increase in efficiency. The bank's ability to understand and process complex requirements has freed our team to focus on core business growth.

2.text: Nepal Bhumi Bank isn't just another financial institution; it's like having a trusted partner that's committed to our success. Our business loves the instant and reliable services it provides, and we've been thrilled with the comprehensive solutions for our financial needs.

3.text: We were amazed at how quickly Nepal Bhumi Bank understood our unique industry requirements and financial data. The customer service has added a layer of trust and reliability that keeps us engaged and satisfied. It's not just the services, but the people behind it offering unparalleled support every step of the way.

4.text: Working with Nepal Bhumi Bank has transformed our approach to banking. Their innovative solutions and dedicated support team have made financial management seamless. We couldn't be happier with the partnership.

5.text: Working with Nepal Bhumi Bank has transformed our approach to banking. Their innovative solutions and dedicated support team have made financial management seamless. We couldn't be happier with the partnership.

companyOverview.heading: Company Overview
companyOverview.description: Nepal Bhumi Bank Limited is a newly established land banking institution dedicated to promoting sustainable development across Nepal. Founded in 2025, we specialize in acquiring fallow or uneven lands and transforming them into productive, eco-friendly communities. Our approach integrates modern infrastructure with environmental conservation, ensuring that every project contributes to a greener, more prosperous Nepal. With a team of experienced professionals in real estate, finance, and sustainability, we aim to make land a secure and valuable asset for individuals, organizations, and the nation.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to bridge unused lands with productive opportunities, fostering economic growth through ethical land management, transparent investments, and community-focused developments.

vision.heading: Our Vision
vision.description: To become Nepal's leading land bank, creating sustainable settlements that balance human progress with nature's preservation for generations to come.

coreValues.heading: Core Values
coreValues.sustainability: Sustainability: Prioritizing eco-friendly practices in all developments.
coreValues.transparency: Transparency: Ensuring clear and honest transactions for all stakeholders.
coreValues.innovation: Innovation: Using modern techniques to enhance land value.
coreValues.communityFocus: Community Focus: Building amenities that improve quality of life.
coreValues.integrity: Integrity: Upholding ethical standards in partnerships and operations.

president.heading: Word from our President
president.name: Mrs. Pabitra Kumari Pokhrel
president.title: President
president.message: As the President of Nepal Bhumi Bank Limited, I am honored to lead an institution dedicated to transforming Nepal's landscape through sustainable land development. Our commitment to ethical practices, environmental conservation, and community welfare drives every decision we make. We believe that land is not just a resource, but a legacy that connects generations. Through transparent operations and innovative solutions, we aim to create lasting value for our stakeholders while contributing to Nepal's sustainable development. Together, we are building a future where land becomes a secure, generational asset for all Nepalis.

cta.heading: Ready to Transform Land into Opportunity?
cta.description: Discover how Nepal Bhumi Bank Limited can help you invest in Nepal's future through sustainable land development.

WhatWeDoPage.heading: What We Do
WhatWeDoPage.subtitle: Services by Nepal Bhumi Bank Limited

1.title: Property Rental & Sales for NRNs
1.description: Renting houses of NRNs (Non-Resident Nepalis) living abroad with full conservation and management, handling buying-selling, and taking complete responsibility for houses, land, apartments, and flats through mutual understanding as needed.

2.title: Real Estate Development
2.description: Buying and selling properties as needed, constructing apartments, parks, halls, malls, and towers for sale and distribution, with all necessary licenses and permits for these operations.

3.title: Problem Land Resolution
3.description: Resolving auctioned lands from banks, financial institutions, associations, and cooperatives. We work to solve problematic land issues and make every effort to resolve land disputes.

4.title: Land & Construction Services
4.description: Land consolidation, soil erosion prevention, surveying, consulting, engineering services, map preparation, and all construction-related works for houses and buildings.

5.title: Financial Advisory Services
5.description: Providing financial consultation services, arranging loans with collateral and guarantees, and offering comprehensive support in financial matters.

6.title: Land Leasing & Utilization
6.description: Leasing government, private, and organizational lands including riverbank and high-tension line areas, connecting them to productive uses.

7.title: Property Maintenance
7.description: Leasing private houses and shelters with full conservation guarantee, including repairs and maintenance for all essential systems and structures.

8.title: Experience Partnership
8.description: Engaging experienced returnees by organizing their skills, knowledge, and resources, and facilitating the exchange of diverse experiences into practical applications.

FormsPage.heading: Forms
FormsPage.subtitle: Fill out the forms below to apply for membership or share purchase.

membership.heading: Membership Application Form
membership.declaration: I/We wish to register in the "Handemalo Campaign" of Nepal Bhumi Bank Ltd. Having seen, understood, and been informed, I will take the services and facilities provided by this bank under the said campaign by paying a one-time service fee of Rs. 25,000/- (Twenty-Five Thousand Rupees Only) willingly and voluntarily without asking for a refund later. I hereby declare that I will not ask for a refund of the said amount and have filled/submitted this registration form.
membership.success: Your application has been submitted successfully!
membership.error: Failed to submit application. Please try again.
